channel.description:
[align=center][b]Break Out [/b][/align]
[b]Update :[/b]
I am working on the intro and outro of Break Out, still no luck doing it.
[b]Update 2 :[/b]
I am putting a hold on this project for awhile, this is due to personal problems, giving me a hard time to focus. Don't worry, it will be back, just taking a break from everything because i need it.
[b]Update 3 :[/b]
Work on the game has been continued for awhile. The level design for map 1 and 2 is done, only need to finish things up. Level 3 level design is still a work in progress, but close to finalization stages.
After i've finished the first 3 levels, i will release an public beta so can try it out for yourselves. Every bug report, suggestion or help is welcome.
[b]Update 4 :[/b]
Demo release will be next month. I think i will include 3 levels in this demo. Not sure.
[b]Update 5 :[/b] [b] Attention Beta Testers ![/b]
I am not gonna make the demo release next months so i'll release the beta that only features level 2. Suggestions and bug reports are welcome. Keep in mind that this is not in any way finished !
Link : Request a link because i need some testers and i don't want too much publicity.
NOTE : The image is still UNFINISHED.
[url='https://i1126.photobucket.com/albums/l610/themaniacboy/breakoutCover.jpg']https://i1126.photobucket.com/albums/l610/themaniacboy/breakoutCover.jpg[/url]
[b]Update 6 :[/b]
Break Out site launched.
[url]https://www.wix.com/break_out/breakout[/url]
[b] I will update this as most as i can.[/b] [b] Maniac Side Productions Team ( currently ) :[/b]
[b]Developer[/b] - themaniacboy
[b]Co-designer[/b] - Schreurder
[b]Storyline[/b] Your name is John Provat, you are a scientist working at the Coredo Research Facility Labs ( CRFL ). Your late on your work and you need to test unknown DNA of a creature that has recently been caught. When you finally arrive on work, you notice that everyone's acting strange today. You get your lab to test the DNA, when you are analyzing it, you notice that the DNA of the Unknown creature includes some human DNA, that is weird, this means it is or was a human. When you are at the terminal to report that the power went out, you suddenly hear a scream behind you. You decide to find out what that was..
[b]Description[/b] A survival horror game, fight your way through hordes of zombies, demons and other evil creatures. The game also contains puzzles, zombies ofcourse, a huge selection of weapons, scary atmosphere that will keep you on the edge of your seat and a story that draws the player in the game.
Please keep in mind, everything what you see here is very early beta and all the media and content that you see, are not finished in any way and will be replaced in the final product.

item.title: Break Out Survival Horror Game
item.dc:creator: themaniacboy
item.description:
Deimos:

Because Source is a massive bitch of an engine to use or customize for beginners (assuming this guys a beginner), some cool engines around to use that offer a lot more customization than Source imo.

I am not a beginner with the Source engine.
I’ve already created a survival map for L4D.
It’s pretty easy to create a map when you understand the engine.
I am also creating an campaign for Amnesia.
This is much harder for beginners than Source.

I am just using FPS Creator because it’s easy to use and you can create maps pretty quick if you’ll like to.
Also because i am developing my game over 8 months and i don’t think it’s a smart move to migrate to another engine.
I am the only guy working on this game, but schreurder motivates me and helps me out with some important stuff.
The deadline is in 2012.
I didn’t tell anyone about this, except schreurder, as co-operating with me.
Although, for my next game i do think to move to another engine.
Don’t know which one would be the best.

item.title: Break Out Survival Horror Game
item.dc:creator: themaniacboy
item.description:
Duck:

the media you have on the site is not much to look at, they are either zoomed into to much or to dark to really see anything…
the fire pic is hard to see the details, and the other is just a wall with some corpses and very dark…

Yes i know, i did this on purpose, it lets your imagination do the work what could hide in the dark.

Is this thing made in FPS Creator?

Yes, but i am trying to avoid making it look like an FPS Creator game.

I never know why some mods want to develop the website before the actual content.

The actual content is already there, but it is not made public yet.
I am really doubting if i should make it public or not, because if i did make it public, some people can’t understand the word unfinished and go posting some unnecessary and unpleasant things.
Most of them do not post constructive comments, only whine or blame the developer for not running it well on their computer.

So, i can upload some unfinished beta, or rather alpha, but i am afraid that would only do harm to me and to the game.
